channel.title: TensorFlow on Yuanye Ma's Blog

item.title: tensorboardX的用法
item.author: yuanye.ma@qq.com (Yuanye Ma)
item.description: pytorch+tensorboardX 简单总结一下tensorboardX的用法。 import numpy as np from tensorboardX import SummaryWriter write = SummaryWriter() for epoch in range(100): write.add_scalar('scale/test', np.random.rand(), epoch) write.add_scalars('scale/scales_test', {'xsinx':epoch*np.sin(epoch), 'xcosx' : epoch*np.cos(epoch)}, epoch) write.close() 在终端中运行上边代码:python ./ten
